mapper.select: select c.*, p.name as project_name, t.name as task_name, d.name as discuss_stage_name from t_customer c left join t_project p on c.project_id = p.id left join t_task t on c.task_id = t.id left join t_discuss_stage d on c.discuss_stage_id = d.id where c.id = #{customerId}

update t_customer set chinese_name = #{chineseName}, english_name = #{englishName}, gender = #{gender}, phone_num = #{phone}, wechat_num = #{wechatNum}, qq_num = #{qqNum}, email = #{email}, office_address = #{officeAddress}, house_address = #{houseAddress}, customer_value = #{customerValue}, project_id = #{projectId}, task_id = #{taskId}, discuss_stage_id = #{discussStageId} where id = #{id}

select c.id, c.chinese_name, c.english_name, p.name as project_name, t.name as task_name from t_customer c left join t_project p on c.project_id = p.id left join t_task t on c.task_id = t.id where c.created_user_id = #{userId}

select c.id, c.chinese_name, c.english_name, p.name as project_name, t.name as task_name from t_customer c left join t_customer_user cu on cu.customer_id = c.id
left join t_project p on c.project_id = p.id left join t_task t on c.task_id = t.id where cu.user_id = #{userId}

select c.id, c.chinese_name, c.english_name, p.name as project_name, t.name as task_name from t_customer c left join t_customer_user cu on cu.customer_id = c.id
left join t_project p on c.project_id = p.id left join t_task t on c.task_id = t.id where c.discuss_stage_id = #{discussStageId} and (c.created_user_id = #{userId} or cu.user_id = #{userId})

select c.id, c.chinese_name, c.english_name, p.name as project_name, t.name as task_name from t_customer c left join t_customer_user cu on cu.customer_id = c.id
left join t_project p on c.project_id = p.id left join t_task t on c.task_id = t.id where (c.created_user_id = #{userId} or cu.user_id = #{userId}) and (english_name like "%"#{str}"%" or chinese_name_pinyin like "%"#{str}"%" or chinese_name like "%"#{str}"%") ;
